sqlMap.statement: SELECT ROWNO AS "ROWNO", LifeCyclClsName AS "LIFECYCLCLSNAME", LodinSeq AS "LODINSEQ", LifeCyclUseDstcd AS "LIFECYCLUSEDSTCD" FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY LodinSeq, LifeCyclClsName ) ROWNO, LifeCyclClsName, LodinSeq, LifeCyclUseDstcd FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEP04 ) ORGTABLE WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#
